DccListener.OnDccChatRequest

delegate void Alaris.Irc.Delegates.Dcc.DccGetRequestEventHandler ( DccUserInfo  dccUserInfo,
string  fileName,
bool  turbo 
)

A remote user has requested a file. To respond use DccFileSession.Send with the relevant information.

Parameters:
dccUserInfo The requestor's information.
fileName The name of the requested file.
turbo True to use send-ahead mode for transfers.

DccListener.OnDccGetRequest

delegate void Alaris.Irc.Delegates.Dcc.DccSendRequestEventHandler ( DccUserInfo  dccUserInfo,
string  fileName,
int  size,
bool  turbo 
)

Another user has offered to send a file.

Parameters:
dccUserInfo The collection of information about the remote user.
fileName The name of the file to be sent.
size The size in bytes of the offered file.
turbo True if the sender will use send-ahead mode.
